org.tantalum.j2me
Class J2MEPlatformUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.tantalum.PlatformUtils
      org.tantalum.j2me.J2MEPlatformUtils

public final class J2MEPlatformUtils
extends PlatformUtils

Utilities for support of each specific platform (J2ME, Android, ..) The platform-specific local copy of this class replaces this base version for other platforms.

Author:
phou

Constructor Detail

J2MEPlatformUtils

public J2MEPlatformUtils()
Create a new instance of the J2ME platform port helper class. This is created for you when your MIDlet extends AndroidMIDlet and calls the super() constructor.
